H0.text: what is the 180 degree line of longitude called. Opposite Meridian

H1.text: what is the 180 degree line of longitude called. Global Divide

H2.text: what is the 180 degree line of longitude called. Longitude Boundary

H3.text: what is the 180 degree line of longitude called. antimeridian

A4.text: The 180th meridian or antimeridian is the meridian 180Â° both east and west of the prime meridian in a geographical coordinate system.

A5.text: The antimeridian passes mostly through the open waters of the Pacific Ocean but also runs across land in Russia, Fiji, and Antarctica.
